Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Char.display_help: Incapacitates a distant foe by Charring them with smoldering soot and cinders. The target is left helpless, choking on the soot. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Char.display_target_help: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Fire_Cages.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in Fire Cages, dealing Fire damage over time. More resilient foes may require multiple Fire Cages to Immobilize. Fire Cages is slower and less damaging than Ring of Fire, but can capture multiple targets. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Cages.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize
Fire_Cages.display_target_help: The Fire Cage is burning you and preventing you from moving.

Smoke.display_help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. The villains are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Smoke.display_target_help: The Smoke is reducing your visual range and chance to hit.
Smoke.display_attacker_hit: You fill the area with {PowerName}, lowering the chance to hit and perception of {PlayerDest}!
Smoke.display_victim_hit: You have been blinded by the Smoke from {PlayerSource}. Your chance to hit and perception have been reduced.

Hot_Feet.display_help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may also suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Hot_Feet.display_target_help: The ground is extremely hot and burning you. Your running speed is reduced.

Flashfire.display_help: You can bring forth a Flashfire to Disorient a group of foes and deal some damage over time. Target must be on the ground to activate Flashfire. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Flashfire.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Disorient

Cinders.display_help: Incapacitates foes around the caster by whirling Cinders around them. The targets are left helpless, choking on the soot. Recharge: Very Long

Bonfire.display_help: You can create a Bonfire that knocks back and burns any foes who try to pass through it. Recharge: Long
Bonfire.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DMG(Fire), Foe Knockback

Fire_Imps.display_help: You can craft 3 small Fire Imps out of pure flame in a targeted location. Fire Imps will viciously attack any nearby foes, but they only possess the most basic instincts. Fire Imps can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

Crush.display_help: Creates a localized gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize a single foe. Crush can also bring down flying entities. This power deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Crush.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

Lift.display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Gravity_Distortion.display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering them unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gravity_Distortion.display_target_help: You have been caught in a Gravity Distortion. You cannot move and cannot fly.

Propel.display_help: You can open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object, then Propel it at your foes for Smashing Damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Crushing_Field.display_help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Crushing_Field.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
Crushing_Field.display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

Dimension_Shift.display_help: Your mastery of gravity allows you to manipulate dimensions, bringing multiple foes out of sync with reality. Your foes becomes completely intangible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space. Recharge: Slow
Dimension_Shift.display_target_help: You have been shifted into an alternate dimension. You powers cannot effect anyone but yourself, but you cannot be harmed.

Gravity_Distortion_Field.display_help: Creates a large, intensely misshapen Gravity Distortion Field that encompasses several foes, rendering them unable to take any action. Recharge: Very Long
Gravity_Distortion_Field.display_target_help: You are being held in a Gravity Distortion Field.

Wormhole.display_help: You can open a gravitational Wormhole behind a targeted foe and violently push them, and all nearby foes, through it. The victims are sent flying out the other end of the Wormhole and are left Disoriented. You determine the location of the Wormhole's end, and can place it high in the air if desired. More powerful foes may be resistant to the Wormhole effects. Recharge: Slow
Wormhole.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Foe Teleport, Disorient, Knockback

Singularity.display_help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Freeze_Ray.display_help: Although this power deals very little damage, the Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding them helpless in place for a while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Freeze_Ray.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Freeze Ray.

Ice_Storm.display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Ice_Storm.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Freezing Rain.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

Blizzard.display_help: The massive damage from the Blizzard can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their chance to hit and possibly knocking them back. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
Blizzard.display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -To-hit, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback, Self -Recovery
Blizzard.display_target_help: You are caught in a freezing Blizzard. You are freezing and your Attack rate, chance to hit and Movement speed are reduced.

Chilblain.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap, dealing some Cold damage over time as well as slightly slowing the target's attack and movement speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Chilblain.display_target_help: The Chilblain is causing damage over time to you, and is holding you immobile. Your Attack rate and Running speed are also reduced.

Block_of_Ice.display_help: You can freeze a single foe in a Block of Ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be held, but all affected targets will be Slowed and take some Cold damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Block_of_Ice.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Frostbite.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes in icy traps. Deals minimal Cold damage over time and slightly Slows the targets. Slower and less damaging than Chilblain, but can capture multiple targets. More resilient foes may only be Slowed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Frostbite.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Cold), Foe Immobilize, -SPD, -Recharge
Frostbite.display_target_help: The Frostbite is causing damage over time to you, and is holding you immobile. Your Attack rate and Running speed are also reduced.

Arctic_Air.display_help: While this power is active, you are surrounded in a fog of Arctic Air that dramatically slows the attack and movement speed of nearby foes. The chill of Arctic Air is so bitter that many foes are forced to flee, albeit very slowly, from the immediate area. Others may attack their own allies, as the fog from the Arctic Air is thick and can cause much confusion. The cold air can also reduced the stealth capability of affected foes. Recharge: Slow
Arctic_Air.display_target_help: The Arctic Air has reduced your Running speed and Attack rate. The cold air has reduced your stealth capability and you are periodically confused, and may attack an incorrect target with your powers.
Arctic_Air.display_attacker_hit: You surround yourself in bitter cold {PowerName}, causing {PlayerSource} to shiver!
Arctic_Air.display_victim_hit: You shiver as the cold {PowerName} from {PlayerSource} hits you, your attack speed and movement rate have been reduced!

Shiver.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.display_target_help: You are shivering. Your attack rate and movement speed are reduced.
Shiver.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} dramatically Slow the attack speed and movement of {PlayerDest}

Ice_Slick.display_help: You can create a large patch of ice at a targeted area, causing all foes that pass through it to lose their footing. Those caught in the Ice Slick are dramatically slowed, tend to fall down and will be unable to jump. Recharge: Slow
Ice_Slick.display_target_help: The Ice Slick has reduced your Running speed.

Flash_Freeze.display_help: You can Flash Freeze a large patch of ground beneath a targeted foe, instantly forming dozens of deadly ice shards that do Cold damage to all enemies in the area. The victims are left trapped within the icicles, but can break free if disturbed. Only targets near the ground can be affected. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Flash_Freeze.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DMG(Cold/Lethal), Foe Sleep
Flash_Freeze.display_target_help: You have been frozen and cannot act.

Glacier.display_help: You can freeze all foes around yourself in blocks of Glacial ice. The targets are frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. Even after the victims emerge, they remain chilled and their attack and movement speed is Slowed for a while. This power can only be cast near the ground. Recharge: Very Long
Glacier.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Glacier. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Jack_Frost.display_help: You can create a very powerful entity of animated ice at a targeted location. Jack Frost possesses several ice powers to attack any nearby foes and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long
Jack_Frost.display_short_help: Summon Jack Frost: Melee Moderate DMG(Cold)

Frozen_Fists.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Frozen_Fists.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Frost.display_help: You create a short cone of Frost in front of you that can deal some damage and Slow a foe's speed, due to their uncontrollable shivering. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your Accuracy. Recharge: Long

Ice_Patch.display_help: You emanate a Patch of Ice around you. Foes that step onto the Ice Patch will slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

Freezing_Touch.display_help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal high damage over time, as well as freezing him in his tracks, leaving him cold and helpless. Damage:High(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: You have been frozen solid and cannot act.

Greater_Ice_Sword.display_help: Your mastery of Ice allows you to create an enhanced blade of solid ice that deals above average damage. Being hit by the Greater Ice Sword will Slow a villain's attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Greater_Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Frozen_Aura.display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. When you perform a Frozen Aura, nearby foes will be frozen within a fragile casing of ice and suffer a moderate amount of cold damage. These frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals moderate damage. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Slow
Frozen_Aura.display_target_help: You have been chilled and cannot act until awakened.

Ice_Bolt.display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Bolt.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Ice Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and chill your enemies, dealing moderate damage and slowing all affected targets' movement and attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Ice_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Power_Boost.display_help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Frost_Breath.display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Frost_Breath.display_target_help: You are freezing. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Frost Breath.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Greater_Ice_Sword.display_help: Ice Slash allows the user to create a blade of solid ice and strike a foe for high damage. Being hit by Ice Slash will Slow a foes' attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Greater_Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You are chilled. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Bitter_Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your chance to hit, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Bitter Ice Bolt.

Spectral_Wounds.display_help: Spectral Wounds convinces the target that they have taken severe damage. The illusion is so convincing that the victim can fall from the Spectral Wounds. However, the damage is not real, and if the victim survives long enough, the illusion will fade and some of the wounds will heal. Damage: High(Illusionary), Recharge: Moderate

Blind.display_help: Painfully Blinds a single targeted foe so severely that they are rendered helpless. Blind is so bright that additional foes may also be blinded, though they will not take any damage, and attacking them will free them from the effects. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Blind.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Psionic), Foe Hold/Sleep

Deceive.display_help: You can Deceive an enemy into believing their friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack their own allies. If you Deceive someone before they have noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Deceived enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Deceive.display_target_help: You have been confused. You may attack an incorrect target.

Flash.display_help: Generates a brilliant flash of light around you that blinds nearby foes. Flashed foes are rendered helpless and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long

Group_Invisibility.display_help: Makes you and all teammates around you Invisible. While Invisible, you and your teammates are almost impossible to detect. Even if discovered, Group Invisibility grants a bonus to your Defense to all attacks, although you will lose some of your defense bonus if you attack. Group Invisibility has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Group_Invisibility.display_target_help: You have been made Invisible and are difficult to detect. Your Defense is increased as a result.

Phantom_Army.display_help: You can fabricate 3 Phantom heroes around a targeted foe. These Phantoms are not real, and are indestructible. Their attacks are similar to Spectral Wounds. Though they deal damage, it is illusory and will heal if the victim survives long enough. Phantoms are short lived and cannot be buffed or healed. Recharge: Very Long

Spectral_Terror.display_help: You can create an illusion of unspeakable Terror. The manifestation is so horrible that it caused most foes to tremble helplessly in terror. The Spectral Terror may also Terrify individual foes, causing them to run away in panic. Recharge: Slow

Phantasm.display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Type ''/release_pets'' in the chat window to release all your pets. Recharge: Very Long

Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Gamblers_Cut.display_help: You perform a quick slash with your katana. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Gamblers_Cut.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Shuriken.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Flashing_Steel.display_help: You swing your katana in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Flashing_Steel.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Divine_Avalanche.display_help: You can use your katana to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

The_Lotus_Drops.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
The_Lotus_Drops.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Soaring_Dragon.display_help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Soaring_Dragon.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Golden_Dragonfly.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Katana attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Golden_Dragonfly.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Quick_Strike.display_help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

Body_Blow.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Smashing_Blow.display_help: Smashing Blow is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to stun than body blow. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Power_Siphon.display_help: Power Siphon adds a small bonus to hit and modifies your other Kinetic Attack powers, so they are now capable of draining the strength of your enemies and adding that strength to you. This effect will stack up to 5 times. Recharge: Very Long

Repulsing_Torrent.display_help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Burst.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be knocked down as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Focused_Burst.display_help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focused Burst deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Total_Focus.display_help: Concentrated Strike is a slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Concentrated Strike, recharge time is very long. Concentrated Strike Criticals do not result in extra damage, instead it instantly recharges the Power Siphon power. Damage: Extreme

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average change to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Shuriken.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Cobra_Strike.display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals minor damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Focus_Chi.display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Crane_Kick.display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals moderate smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: The Crippling Axe Kick has crippled you. You are immobilized and your Running speed will be reduced once you can move again.

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals slightly more damage than Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Eagles_Claw.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Eagles_Claw.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

Burst.display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Burst.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

Soldiers.display_help: Calls forth one to three Mercenary Soldiers (depending on your level) to do your bidding. The third Soldier you gain will be a Medic. All Soldiers use Sub Machine Guns, but these can be upgraded. You may only have 3 Soldiers under your control at any given time. If you attempt to call more Soldiers, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Slug.display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Spec_Ops.display_help: You can enlist one to two highly skilled Spec Ops Mercenary (depending on your level). Spec Ops weapons are highly accurate and long ranged, and they are adept in many different tactical weapons. Like all Henchmen, Spec Ops can be equipped with even deadlier munitions. You may only have 2 Spec Ops under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Spec Ops, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

M30_Grenade.display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Commando.display_help: Enlists one highly trained Commando. The Commando is a seasoned professional who favors heavy assault weapons. He is simply a one man army that can leave a wake of destruction in his path. In addition to standard Soldier resistance, the Commandos experience also makes him resistant to Fear and his rugged advanced training makes him slightly resistant to Fire, Cold and Toxic Damage. You may only have 1 Commando under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Commando, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Serum.display_help: You can use a special Serum to turn one Mercenary into a virtually Unstoppable killing machine for a short time. Once the Mercenary is injected with this Serum, his Damage, chance to hit, Endurance Recovery, and Damage Resistance to all damage except Psionics, will be greatly increased. The target Mercenary will also be virtually immune to controlling effects including Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize and Knockback. After the Serum wears off, the Mercenary will be exhausted and drained of all Endurance and be unable to recover endurance for a short while. Recharge: Very Long

Mesmerize.display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering them unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mesmerize.display_target_help: You have been Mesmerized and cannot act.

Levitate.display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dominate.display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in their own mind and unable to defend themselves. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Confuse.display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing that foe to believe their friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack their own allies. If you Confuse someone before they have noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate
Confuse.display_target_help: You have been confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: Hypnotizes a group of foes at a distance and puts them to Sleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. This power deals no damage, but if done discreetly, the targets will never be aware of your presence. Recharge: Slow
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: You have been Hypnotized and cannot act.

Total_Domination.display_help: Tears at the mind of a target foe and those near them. Dominate renders all affected foes helpless, lost in their own minds and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long

Terrify.display_help: This power Terrifies foes within a cone area in front of you, causing them to tremble in Fear uncontrollably. The affect is so frightening and overwhelming, that the target takes real damage from the physiological response to this Psionic attack. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Mass_Confusion.display_help: You can cause Mass Confusion within a group of foes, creating chaos. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring all heroes. If you Confuse villains before they noticed you, your presence will continue to go unnoticed. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Mass_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Dark_Blast.display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Dark_Blast.display_target_help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

Zombie_Horde.display_help: Summons one to three Zombies (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Zombies are very tough but can be slow and stupid. They start out with only rudimentary melee attacks, but can be empowered with range and even life draining powers. You may only have 3 Zombies under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Zombies, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing their chance to hit Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your chance to hit.

Skeletal_Warriors.display_help: You can summon one to two powerful Grave Knights (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Grave Knights come well equipped with several attack powers and can be empowered with even more. You may only have 2 Grave Knights under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Grave Knights, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce their chance to hit. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Life_Drain.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Target -To Hit, Self +HP
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Soul_Extraction.display_help: You can extract the soul from one of your defeated Undead Henchmen and summon its spectral essence to do your bidding. The power of the soul is dependent upon the type of undead Henchman you extract it from, however it will always be one level lower than you. Unlike your other Henchman, the extracted Soul is only loosely bound to your control and will eventually move on to the next world. The Soul cannot gain new powers with Enchanted Undead or Dark Empowerment. Recharge: Very Long

Lich.display_help: Summons a dark and powerful Lich. The lich is an undead entity that, when alive, possessed many dark powers of his own. Perhaps it was a dark wizard, or powerful arch villain. Perhaps it was even a Necromancer. Now it only hungers for the souls of the living, and is quite good at feeding itself. The Lich specializes in dark control and draining powers. You may only have 1 Lich under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Lich, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Snap_Shot.display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Call_Genin.display_help: Calls forth one to three Genin Ninja (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Genin have good reflexes and jumping skill, but they are still the lowest rank Ninja and only possess the most rudimentary skills, However, they can be trained in more advanced techniques and weapons. You may only have 3 Genin under your control at any given time. If you attempt to call Genin, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Aimed_Shot.display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than Snap Shot. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Fistful_of_Arrows.display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Call_Jounin.display_help: You can summon one to two highly skilled Jounin Ninja (depending on your level). Jounin Ninja are master assassins and expert swordsmen. They possess superior reflexes and jumping skill. Like all Henchmen, Jounin can be trained in even deadlier Ninjitsu techniques and weapons. You may only have 2 Jounin under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Jounin, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Oni.display_help: Summons an ancient and powerful Oni. An Oni is a powerful human-like demon warrior. The Oni is a formidable creature who possesses the skill of a warrior and the powers of wind and fire. You may only have 1 Oni under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Oni, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Smoke_Flash.display_help: You can command one of your Ninja Henchmen to throw down a Smoke Bomb. The Smoke Flash will allow the Ninja to Placate his nearby foes, and thus unable to target the Ninja. The Smoke Flash also makes the Ninja stealthy and Hidden for about 10 seconds, enabling him to perform Critical hits with his next few attacks. You can only use this power on a Ninja Henchmen. Recharge: Slow

Entangle.display_help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Entangle.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Entangle.display_target_help: The roots have Entangled you, crushing and cutting you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

Strangler.display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling them with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while they is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Strangler.display_target_help: The Strangler Vine is crushing you and preventing you from acting.

Roots.display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Roots.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Roots.display_target_help: The Roots have entangled you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

Spore_Burst.display_help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around them. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Recharge: Slow
Spore_Burst.display_target_help: The Spore Burst has rendered you unconscious! Any damage will awaken you, however.

Seeds_of_Confusion.display_help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long
Seeds_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Spirit_Tree.display_help: You can tap into the elusive and powerful energy of the World Tree and extract a Spirit Tree at a targeted location. The Sprit Tree is immobile, but possesses incredible regenerative powers. The Regeneration Rate of you, or your allies, will be greatly increased as long as you are near the Spirit Tree. Recharge: Very Long

Vines.display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Very Long
Vines.display_target_help: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.

Carrion_Creepers.display_help: You can create a Creeper patch at a targeted location. The patch will snag foes, slowing their movement, and preventing them from jumping or flying. Additionally, a Creeper Vine will burst from under each live and defeated foe in the area and start attacking your enemies. Creeper Vines do minimal damage, but they can knock down your enemies and its poisonous thorns can slow your foes. Any foes that are defeated in the Creeper patch will also produce a growth of Entangle Roots that will Immobilize any enemies near the defeated foe. Recharge: Very Long

Fly_Trap.display_help: You can summon a giant carnivorous Fly Trap plant beast. Fly Trap may be an understatement, as this plant beast has a taste for flesh. The Fly Trap will viciously attack any nearby foes; biting, hurling poisonous Thorns and even casting its own Entangle Roots. The Fly Trap will fight by your side and can be healed and buffed like any teammate. Recharge: Very Long
Fly_Trap.display_short_help: Summon Fly Trap: Ranged Control Special

Psionic_Dart.display_help: This basic attack does minor Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed, but has a very fast attack rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Psionic_Dart.display_target_help: The Psionic Dart has slowed your Attack rate.

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack of intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of you nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psionic_Lance.display_help: This extremely long range Psionic attack has a bonus to Accuracy, and can Slow a target's attack rate. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Lance.display_target_help: The Psionic Lance has reduced your Attack rate.

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Subdue.display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Blast.display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Will_Domination.display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Psionic_Tornado.display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Psionic_Tornado.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
Psionic_Tornado.display_target_help: You are taking psionic damage over time.

Scramble_Thoughts.display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving them dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Psychic_Wail.display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Psychic_Wail.display_short_help: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Psionic), Foe Disorient -Recharge, Self -Recovery
Psychic_Wail.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Neutrino_Bolt.display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Bolt can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Neutrino_Bolt.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Neutrino Bolt.

X-Ray_Beam.display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
X-Ray_Beam.display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the X-Ray Beam.

Irradiate.display_help: You can emit lethal amounts of radiation in all directions, damaging all nearby foes for a short time. Like other Radiation attacks, this power can bypass some of a target's defenses. Irradiate severely reduces the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Irradiate.display_target_help: You are irradiated and taking damage over time. Your Defense has been reduced.

Electron_Haze.display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Electron_Haze.display_short_help: Close, Moderate Cone DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback
Electron_Haze.display_target_help: The Electron Haze has reduced your Defenses.

Proton_Volley.display_help: Hurls a volley of alpha particles over an extremely long range. Proton Volley can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance as it can be interrupted. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Proton_Volley.display_target_help: The Proton Volley has reduced your Defenses.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Cosmic_Burst.display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Cosmic_Burst.display_target_help: You are disoriented and your Defenses are reduced.

Neutron_Bomb.display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Neutron_Bomb.display_target_help: The Neutron Bomb has reduced your Defenses.

Atomic_Blast.display_help: This attack taps most of your stored energy to deal a devastating Atomic Blast. Any foes left standing will have their Defense greatly reduced and may be left helplessly chocking on toxic vapors. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Atomic_Blast.display_short_help: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Hold, -DEF, Self -Recovery
Atomic_Blast.display_target_help: The Atomic Blast has left you held and your defenses are reduced.

Pulse_Rifle_Blast.display_help: This Pulse Rifle can fire a long range laser pulse. Deals moderate Smashing/Energy damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Battle_Drones.display_help: Construct one to three Battle Drones (depending on your level) to do your bidding. Drones start out with only basic weaponry, but can be upgraded with heavier energy weapons. Drones can Super Leap. You may only have 3 Drones under your control at any given time. If you attempt to construct more Drones, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have three, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Pulse_Rifle_Burst.display_help: This high powered laser pulse from your Pulse Rifle takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard pulse and has a very good chance to send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Photon_Grenade.display_help: Launches an Energy Grenade at long range from your Pulse Rifle. The energy from this explosion can Disorient some targets in the affected area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Photon_Grenade.display_target_help: The Photon Grenade has Disoriented you.

Protector_Bots.display_help: You can summon one to two powerful Protector Bots (depending on your level). Protector Bots can defend your army by placing Force Fields on you and your allies. They can even be equipped to repair your other Robot Henchmen. Make no mistake though, the best defense is a good offense, and Protector Bots are well equipped with energy weapons. You may only have 2 Protector Bots under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon more Protector Bots, you can only replace the ones you have lost in battle. If you already have two, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Repair.display_help: You can release a small swarm of nanites that can Repair one Robot Henchmen to full health and restores some of its Endurance. This power only works on your Robot Henchmen. Recharge: Slow

Assault_Bot.display_help: Builds one massive Assault Bot. Simply put, the Assault Bot is a killing machine. There is nothing subtle about its weaponry. You may only have 1 Assault Bot under your control at any given time. If you attempt to summon another Assault Bot, the power will fail. Recharge: Very Long

Call_Swarm.display_help: You summon a swarm of stinging insects to harass your foe causing Light Lethal damage over time and reducing both their movement speed and defense. This power grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Light DoT, Recharge: Very Fast
Call_Swarm.display_target_help: The swarm has reduced your defense and movement speed.

Maiming_Slash.display_help: You execute a savage slash at your foe's lower body causing moderate lethal damage and minor damage over time. The foe will also have their movement speed reduced moderately. Maiming Slash grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Slash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, +1 Blood Frenzy
Maiming_Slash.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced and you are bleeding!

Vicious_Slash.display_help: You tear at your foe with both hands dealing high lethal damage and causing minor lethal damage over time. Foes struck by this attack have a high chance to be knocked down. Vicious Slash grants 2 stacks of Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Vicious_Slash.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Self +2 Blood Frenzy

Call_Ravens.display_help: With a mighty roar, you command an unkindness of ravens to quickly assault and harass your foes. Your foes will suffer Moderate Lethal damage over time and have their speed and defense reduced. The power inflicts lethal damage over time that scales in strength with the number Blood Frenzy stacks. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Call_Ravens.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, -Defense, -Fly, +1 Blood Frenzy

Spot_Prey.display_help: You tap into your core senses and attempt to spot vulnerable prey. Your chance to hit and damage are both increased for a few seconds. Your perception is greatly increased for a longer amount of time. Recharge: Long
Spot_Prey.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Rending_Flurry.display_help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Rending_Flurry.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

Blood_Craze.display_help: You go into a blood craze, making you quickly shrug aside some of the damage received. Blood Craze will immediately heal you for a small amount and cause you to heal for a moderate amount of health over a short time seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Blood_Craze.display_target_help: You are recovering health over time due to your Blood Thirst.
Blood_Craze.display_attacker_hit: You take a moment to clear your head and recover from your wounds.

Call_Hawk.display_help: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of stacks of Blood Frenzy. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy causes you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of its damage over time effect is increased. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow
Call_Hawk.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly
Call_Hawk.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Hawk's attack.

Feral_Charge.display_help: You throw yourself at your target while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing it to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you charge from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Feral Charge builds 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Feral_Charge.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), +3 Blood Frenzy, Self Teleport

Savage_Strike.display_help: You quickly tear at your foe dealing minor lethal damage and causing minor lethal damage over time. This power can bruise an enemy, making them more vulnerable to damage. Savage Strikes grants you 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Minor, Minor DoT, Recharge: Very Fast
Savage_Strike.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -RES(All), Self +1 Blood Frenzy

Maiming_Slash.display_help: You execute a savage slash at your foe's lower body causing moderate lethal damage and minor damage over time. The foe will also have their movement speed reduced moderately. Maiming Slash grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Fast
Maiming_Slash.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT(Lethal), Foe -Speed, Self +1 Blood Frenzy
Maiming_Slash.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced and you are bleeding!

Call_Hawk.display_help: You call forth a hawk ally to swoop in and viciously peck at your target causing High Lethal damage. The attack often catches foes off their guard and can knock them down as well as reducing their chance to hit. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of stacks of Blood Frenzy. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy causes you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of its damage over time effect is increased. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow
Call_Hawk.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), Foe -To Hit, Knockdown, -Fly
Call_Hawk.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Hawk's attack.

Shred.display_help: You rapidly slash at your foes several times causing a moderate amount of damage to all enemies in front of you and reduce their defense. Shred also causes minor lethal damage over time. This power grants 1 stack of Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Shred.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Def(All), Self +1 Blood Frenzy
Shred.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced and you are bleeding.

Blood_Thirst.display_help: You unleash your frenzy, increasing your damage and chance to hit moderately. Blood Thirst also grants 5 stacks of Frenzy Fury. Recharge: Very Long
Blood_Thirst.display_attacker_hit: You unleash your thirst for blood and increase your damge!

Vicious_Slash.display_help: You tear at your foe with both hands dealing high lethal damage and causing minor lethal damage over time. Foes struck by this attack have a high chance to be knocked down. Damage: High, Minor DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Vicious_Slash.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Knockdown, Self +2 Blood Frenzy

Rending_Flurry.display_help: You wildly slash at nearby foes to deal moderate lethal damage and cause minor lethal damage over time. This power consumes all Blood Frenzy and will deal additional damage per stack of Blood Frenzy consumed. If you have 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy while activating this power, its radius is greatly increased, but causes you to become Exhausted for a short time. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: Moderate, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Rending_Flurry.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

Hemorrhage.display_help: You viciously tear at your foe causing a light amount of lethal damage. Additionally, the target will suffer from lethal damage over time. Hemorrhage consumes all stacks of Blood Frenzy. This power's damage over time effect will scale with the number of stacks of Blood Frenzy. Using this power with 5 stacks of Blood Frenzy causes you to become Exhausted for a short time, but the duration of Hemorrhage's damage over time effect is increased. While exhausted you cannot gain Blood Frenzy. Damage: High, Special DoT, Recharge: Slow
Hemorrhage.display_short_help: Melee, Light DMG(Lethal), Foe Special DoT(Lethal), -Blood Frenzy

Savage_Leap.display_help: You throw yourself at your distant foes while slashing and tearing wildly dealing moderate lethal damage and causing your foes to suffer from additional minor lethal damage over time. The damage of this power can increase based on how far away you leap from, with up to double damage dealt at its strongest. Savage Leap build 1 stacks of Blood Frenzy for every 20 ft in between your target and you, up to 3 stacks. Damage: Superior, Minor DoT, Recharge: Long
Savage_Leap.display_short_help: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal), Self 1 to 3 Blood Frenzy, Teleport

Shriek.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shriek.display_target_help: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Scream.display_target_help: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Slow
Howl.display_target_help: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shockwave.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Shout.display_help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging them and reducing their Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Shout.display_target_help: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Amplify.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

Sirens_Song.display_help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
Sirens_Song.display_target_help: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.

Dreadful_Wail.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Disorient, -Resist, Self -Recovery
Dreadful_Wail.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Barb_Swipe.display_help: Shred your opponent with several quick Swipes from your Spines. Barb Swipe deals minor damage over time. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Very Fast
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Lunge.display_help: You can lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large Spine on your arm. Lunge deals moderate damage. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Lunge.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Impale.display_help: You can throw a single large Spine at a targeted foe. This Spine does only moderate damage, but carries a large amount of the Spine toxin. A successful attack can completely Immobilize most foes, as well as Slowing them and dealing Toxic poison damage. Impale can also bring down flying entities. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to fly.

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all villains in a wide arc in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Spine poison Slows affected targets and deals additional Toxic damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Quill_Throwing.display_help: You can throw dozens of Spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Spine throwing deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Quill_Throwing.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Mercurial_Blow.display_help: You strike your foe with a lightning fast blow from your staff dealing Light Smashing damage. The attack is so unexpected that the target's defenses are reduced slightly for a short time. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Light, Recharge: Fast
Mercurial_Blow.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Mercurial Blow.

Precise_Strike.display_help: You attempt to daze your foe with a heavy staff blow to their head. Precise Strike has a higher chance to hit than normal, deals Moderate Smashing damage, and has a small chance to disorient the target briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast.

Serpents_Reach.display_help: You fully extend your staff and release a burst of energy to lash out at a distant target and deal High Smashing damage with a good chance to knock your target down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Guarded_Spin.display_help: You spin your staff like a propeller in front of you dealing Light Smashing damage to enemies in your frontal arc and deflecting any incoming attacks, thus boosting your Melee and Lethal damage briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Guarded_Spin.display_target_help: Your Guarded Spin has increased your defense moderately.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Eye_of_the_Storm.display_help: With a lightning fast series of spins of your staff you strike at all nearby foes dealing moderate damage with a chance of knocking foes down. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and reduce damage resistance slightly for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and reduce attack and movement speed for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and reduce defense for a short time. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Eye_of_the_Storm.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Consumes Perfection
Eye_of_the_Storm.display_target_help: Eye of the Storm has been empowered by the user's Perfection levels causing it to have lingering effects.

Innocuous_Strikes.display_help: You repeatedly batter your foes' feet and legs with a flurry of sweeps of your staff. This attack deals Moderate Smashing damage to all foes within its cone. All affected targets will have their movement speed reduced, with a chance of being immobilized briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Innocuous_Strikes.display_short_help: Melee Cone, High DMG(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Speed
Innocuous_Strikes.display_target_help: Your movement speed has been reduced!

Sky_Splitter.display_help: You leap into the air and hammer your foe with an overhead bash from your staff. Sky Splitter deals Extreme Smashing damage, will knock the target off their feet and leave them held briefly. While a form is active, this power will build one level of Perfection if the user has two or less levels, if the user has three levels of Perfection it will consume them and gain some benefit. 3 Levels of Perfection of Body will cause additional smashing damage and grant the user a bonus to damage resistance a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Mind will cause additional psionic damage and boost the user's chance to hit for a short time. 3 Levels of Perfection of Soul will cause additional energy damage and increase the user's regeneration and recovery rate briefly. Critical Hit damage isn't enhanced by levels of Perfection. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Sky_Splitter.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient, Consumes Perfection

Stone_Fist.display_help: Your stone covered fists attack swiftly for moderate damage, and may Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Stone_Fist.display_short_help: Melee Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient

Heavy_Stone_Fist.display_help: Your control over the earth allows you to form a mallet of solid stone. This Stone Mallet deals heavy damage, and can knock down weak foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Fault.display_help: This powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fault towards a targeted foe, throwing him and nearby enemies into the air and possibly Disorienting them. Fault deals no damage on its own. Recharge: Slow

Seismic_Smash.display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Seismic_Smash.display_target_help: You have been held by the crushing earth.

Hurl_Boulder.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High Recharge: Moderate
Hurl_Boulder.display_target_help: You have been hit by a Hurled Boulder and cannot fly.

Tremor.display_help: You can cause a localized earthquake immediately around you. This will deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Jab.display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off their feet, unable to attack again until they stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Haymaker.display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Hand_Clap.display_help: You can clap your hands together with such force that you create a deafening shockwave. This shockwave can knock back nearby foes, and they have a chance to become Disoriented due to the shock to the inner ear. Hand Clap deals no damage. Recharge: Slow

Knockout_Blow.display_help: You can perform a Knockout Blow on your opponent. This punch does Superior damage, and has a great chance of Holding your target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Rage.display_help: A Rage comes over you, sending you into a berserker fury. While Raging, your damage and chance to hit are dramatically increased. However, when your Rage subsides, you are left with reduced Defense, drained of some of your Endurance, and your attacks are substantially weakened. Recharge: Very Long
Rage.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has greatly increased your damage and accuracy!

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You have been hit by a piece of concrete and cannot fly.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Thorny_Darts.display_help: Hurls small Thorny Darts at your foes. Thorny Darts deal minor damage. Poison from the Darts deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Thorny_Darts.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Skewer.display_help: You lunge forward with this melee attack and Skewer your foe with the large Thorn on your arm. Deals moderate damage and poisons your foe. Poison from the Thorns deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Skewer.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Fling_Thorns.display_help: You can throw dozens of Thorns in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the area. These Thorns deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes' Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fling_Thorns.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Impale.display_help: You can throw a small cluster of large Thorns at a targeted foe. These Thorns carry a large amount of the toxin. In addition to dealing Toxic damage, a successful attack can slow a target, preventing Running, Jumping or Flying. Most foes will likely be completely Immobilized, unable to run. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to run, jump or fly.

Aim.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Thorn_Burst.display_help: You can explode dozens of Thorns in all directions around you. These Thorns only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Toxic damage from the thorns can reduce the Defense of affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorntrops.display_help: You fling dozens of Thorns into the ground at a targeted location. The small Thorns pepper the ground over a large area. Any enemy that pass over the Thorntrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Thorntrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc directly in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Thorn_Barrage.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Thorn Barrage unleashes your Thorns at high velocity causing severe damage at close range. Although these Thorns only travel a short distance, their impact can knock most foes on their back. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Barrage.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Pistols.display_help: Quickly fires a round from one of your heavy automatic pistols. Damage is average, but the fire rate is very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Call_Thugs.display_help: Calls forth one to three Thugs (depending on your level) to do your bidding. The third Thug you gain will be an Arsonist. Thugs use Dual Pistols and can be taught additional pistol attacks. You may only have 3 Thugs under your control at any given time.
